entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then clearing. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
